channel.title: [PI] Looping Animation [PI]
channel.description:
[B]Hey there guys,
This base I have (posted by nintendo) is all working very smoothly, except some animations (like cutting wood, mining) they look fine, except I click off the rock or tree and start walking, and the animation keeps on playing, I have tried many things like changing emote... try making the timer different and messed around with return; however it doesnt seem to be working...
I just be very grateful if you guys could share your knowledge, give me a clue or tell me whats the problem and how to fix... or how about to go fixing it :)
BTW yeah im not pro :s and this is sort of new to me... but respect the fact that I have tried THANKS GUYS :D[/B]
[B]IMPORTANT> And to let you know, it loads alot of 602 and 525 animations... so I dont know if that will make a difference or not :P and to also let you know, it stops chopping logs but just carries on the anim.[/B]
[IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/2171/llllll.gif[/img]

item.title: [PI] Looping Animation [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Evolscape, post:1, topic:371957”][B]Hey there guys,

This base I have (posted by nintendo) is all working very smoothly, except some animations (like cutting wood, mining) they look fine, except I click off the rock or tree and start walking, and the animation keeps on playing, I have tried many things like changing emote… try making the timer different and messed around with return; however it doesnt seem to be working…

I just be very grateful if you guys could share your knowledge, give me a clue or tell me whats the problem and how to fix… or how about to go fixing it

BTW yeah im not pro :s and this is sort of new to me… but respect the fact that I have tried THANKS GUYS :D[/B]

IMPORTANT> And to let you know, it loads alot of 602 and 525 animations… so I dont know if that will make a difference or not and to also let you know, it stops chopping logs but just carries on the anim.

[/quote]

Make a method that resets woodcutting and have it reset your animation.

Read full topic
